title: New LockBit 5.0 Targets Windows, Linux, ESXi

summary: LockBit 5.0 represents a significant evolution of the LockBit ransomware family, now targeting Windows, Linux, and VMware ESXi environments with a unified codebase. This research details the heavy obfuscation techniques including string encryption and API hashing, anti-analysis measures that detect sandboxes and debuggers, and geopolitical safeguards that skip CIS-region systems. The article covers the full kill chain from initial access through lateral movement to encryption, with comparative analysis against previous LockBit versions.
